tool_description: Crossref makes research outputs easy to find, cite, link, assess, and reuse.
name: crossref
title: crossref

api_list.name: DOI
api_list.description: Information of a article with specified doi.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crossref.p.rapidapi.com/10.1111/fima.12262"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crossref.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crossref.p.rapidapi.com/{doi}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crossref.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
